participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Samantha is adventurous and passionate about animal rights. She enjoys spending time outdoors and has a creative side.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and laid-back, always looking to help others. He has a love for music and enjoys sharing stories from his life.
